name: minesweep-rs
description: Sweep some mines for fun, and probably not for profit.
readme_summary: minesweep-rs is a terminal-based implementation of the classic Minesweeper game, built using the Rust programming language and the tui-rs library for creating the user interface. It offers a fun and engaging way to play Minesweeper directly in your command line.
primary_use_case: Playing the classic Minesweeper game in a terminal environment.
cover_image_prompt: A stylized, retro-futuristic terminal screen displaying a Minesweeper game in progress. The player character, represented by a small, determined robot, is carefully navigating a grid of minefield squares. Some squares are revealed, showing numbers indicating adjacent mines, while others remain hidden, with a few ominous red 'mine' icons peeking out. Small, glowing data streams flow from the terminal screen, subtly suggesting the underlying code and game logic. The overall mood is one of focused, digital puzzle-solving. The art style should be a clean, 3D isometric illustration with a neon-infused color palette, emphasizing the digital nature of the game and the terminal interface.

name: vibetest-use
description: Vibetest MCP - automated QA testing using Browser-Use agents
readme_summary: Vibetest MCP is a Python-based tool that automates QA testing for websites using Browser-Use agents. It functions as an MCP server to launch multiple agents that can identify UI bugs, broken links, and accessibility issues on both live and local development sites.
key_features: Support for live and localhost sites
primary_use_case: Automated quality assurance testing of websites to identify and report UI bugs, broken links, and accessibility issues.
cover_image_prompt: A diligent digital gardener meticulously inspecting a vibrant, sprawling website-tree. Each leaf on the tree represents a webpage, and the gardener uses a magnifying glass emitting glowing data particles to spot any blemishes, broken branches (links), or wilting sections (accessibility issues). Small, stylized browser windows float around the gardener, acting as his tools. The background is a clean, modern interface with subtle code snippets. The overall scene is a 3D isometric illustration with a bright, clean color palette, emphasizing growth, health, and thorough inspection of the website.
